page.title: 09What's on in Kinoulton
page.content: {WHIST DRIVE-}Every Friday at 7.30pm {MOTHER and TODDLER GROUP-}Thursday 2.15 - 3.45pm.{ {YOUTH CLUB-}Every Thursday from 7-10pm {OVER 60's FRIENDSHIP GROUP}is held occasionally from 3.00-5.00pm,Tuesday. {VILLAGE GARDENING CLUB-}Once a month in the Chapel Schoolroom at 8.00pm. {CHRISTIAN FELLOWSHIP GROUP-}Every Tuesday at 7.45pm at 6 Pinfold Close. {WOMEN'S INSTITUTE- }Occasionally. {LIBRARY SERVICE-}Van calls fortnightly {BABY CLINIC-}Monthly-Wednesday,2-4pm. {BROWNIES-}Wednesday,6.00-7,30pm. {CUBS-}Monday, 6.15 - 7.45pm. {DARTS and DOMINOES-}Wednesday at 8.30pm in the Nevile Arms. {FLEX KEEP FIT-}Monday,8.00-9.00pm. {SAVE the CHILDREN GROUP}is being formed. Venue-Village Hall unless otherwise stated.
